content: The `Image` component is used to display images. It supports standard image props like `src`, `alt`, `width`, and `height`.
You can provide a `fallbackSrc` prop to display a fallback image if the main `src` is loading or fails to load.
The Image component has built-in effects. `isBlurred` creates a blurred background effect. `isZoomed` makes the image zoom in on hover.
By default, the Image component shows a skeleton animation while the image is loading, followed by a fade-in animation once loaded. This can be disabled with `disableSkeleton`.
You can use the optimized Next.js Image component with HeroUI's Image by passing it to the `as` prop or wrapping it.
